solution_line_template: He will spend {route_a_one_way} x {round_trip_multiplier} = <<{route_a_one_way}*{round_trip_multiplier}={route_a_total}>>{route_a_total} hours if he takes route A.
Meanwhile, he will spend {route_b_one_way} x {round_trip_multiplier} = <<{route_b_one_way}*{round_trip_multiplier}={route_b_total}>>{route_b_total} hours if he takes route B.
Therefore, Joseph can save {route_a_total} - {route_b_total} = <<{route_a_total}-{route_b_total}={time_saved}>>{time_saved} hours if he takes route B both ways.
